title: Testimonials
text:
Feedback from our lovely pet owners ğŸ’•

  

    
      
        
        
          Tricia V. â€¢ Boarding
          â€œThis was the first time I have ever left my dogs with someone that they don't know but the experience was absolutely brilliant. Olivia is very calm and chilled with them and they clearly enjoyed their time with her â€” I received pictures and updates which was really helpful and they were clearly given the home from home treatment â€” so happy and a big thank you to Olivia xxâ€
        
      
      Betty & Basil â€¢ Briards
    

    
      
        
        
          Penka H. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œOlivia was wonderful, I am so happy with her looking after Denzel on my wedding day. â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ I was relaxed and enjoyed my day knowing he was safe with her.â€
        
      
      Denzel â€¢ Jack Russell
    

    
      
        
        
          Helen S. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œFrom the moment we saw Olivia's listing, we felt so positively about her â€” she seemed so genuine and dog-centric. Happily, our first instincts were spot on; we genuinely couldn't have found a better person to care for Riley. He's such an anxious dog, and on the few occasions he has stayed with friends, it hasn't always worked out well. We were so incredibly lucky to have found Olivia â€” she is truly someone with a gentle soul, and our Riley instantly hit it off with her (which is a HUGE thing!). She was so patient with all the logistics of the day and adjustments to timings, never once making us feel bad about having to amend things. On the day itself, the photos she shared of Riley resting/playing or sleeping were so reassuring. We would not hesitate to rebook Olivia again â€” if she'd have our crazy dog again, that is!â€
        
      
      Riley â€¢ Vizsla
    
    
    
      
        
        
          Tolga D. â€¢ Boarding
          â€œTheo had the best time at Oliviaâ€™s! Olivia provided updates throughout the day and put my mind at such ease (with having an anxious dog). He was so well looked after and had a great time hanging out with Olivia. 1000/10 would highly recommend â­.â€
        
      
      Theo â€¢ Cockapoo
    
    
        
      
        
        
          Martha M. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œOlivia was amazing with Milo. She sent me videos/pics of Milo & updated me throughout the day. You can tell how much care and love she puts into caring for dogs. I would highly recommend Olivia!â€
        
      
      Milo â€¢ Chihuahua
    
    
            
      
        
        
          Jade A. â€¢ Boarding
          â€œOlivia was so amazing with my lab Cassie. She settled in very quickly and came home happy, calm, and clearly well cared for. I really appreciated the regular updates and photos â€“ it was lovely to see how relaxed Cassie was while I was away. Iâ€™d definitely recommend Olivia to anyone looking for a caring and reliable dog sitter. Thank you again!â€
        
      
      Cassie â€¢ Labrador Retriever
    
    
                
      
        
        
          Marcella H. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œI left my dog with Olivia today for 12 hours and was so anxious but Olivia was so nice and welcoming to both me and my dog. She sent me pictures all throughout the day and stayed in regular contact. I definitely recommend her !!!â€
        
      
      Bear â€¢ Rottweiler/German Shepherd
    
    
                    
      
        
        
          Bethany M. â€¢ Boarding
          â€œOlivia was incredible with Mili! Totally understood her needs as a slightly anxious dog and they managed to form a bond super quickly!â€
        
      
      Mili â€¢ Mixed, Staffordshire Bull Terrier
    
    
                        
      
        
        
          Seema I. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œDaisy loved her first sitting experience. Thanks Olivia for looking after Daisy and I felt confident leaving her with you.â€
        
      
      Daisy â€¢ Labrador Retriever
    
    
                            
      
        
        
          Amir R. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œOlivia was very responsive from the start and always tried to work around our schedule. Malibu had lots of fun with her and she kept us informed of how she was doing with photos which was very reassuring. We will keep Olivia our first choice on our next sitter arrangements.â€
        
      
      Malibu â€¢ Alaskan Malamute
    
    
                                
      
        
        
          Alexandra D. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œI thoroughly recommend Olivia. She is kind, gentle and trustworthy. I will definitely book her again in the future as my dog Minnie was very comfortable with Olivia and came back happy.â€
        
      
      Minnie â€¢ Jack Russell
    
    
                                    
      
        
        
          Martin & Nisha M. â€¢ Day Care
          â€œRocco can be a bit shy / lacking confidence on his first day care but he had a good day with Olivia and she enjoyed him. She kept in touch throughout the day and he had a few sneaky naps on her couch! I recommend her and intend to use her againâ€
        
      
      Rocco â€¢ Labrador Retriever
    
    
                                        
      
        
        
          Boonnie B. â€¢ Boarding
          â€œOlivia was beyond fabulous. She made our first stay away for our puppy very easy and smoothy. Our puppy was cared for and loved. I would recommend her to anyone and will definitely use her again. Thank you so much Olivia!â€
        
      
      Cali â€¢ Labradoodle

title: Booking
text:
Our Cancellation Policy
We understand that sometimes things change, so if you do need to cancel or amend your booking, please get in touch within 48hours of the booking start time for a full refund. Any cancellations made after this time may be subject to a Â£20 fee.

title: About Me
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Olivia â€” dog sitter and founder of Dog Sit Daily. Iâ€™m a calm, detail-oriented carer who treats every dog like my own. I don't currently have any dogs of my own at home but dog sitting is a service I previously relied on, so I understand how life-changing it is to have someone you truly trust looking after your dog â€” especially if they have separation anxiety!

    Whether your dog needs a walk, a cosy place to stay, Iâ€™ll be your dog's best friend while you're away. Iâ€™m experienced with puppies through seniors, including nervous and anxious dogs. Iâ€™ve learned from group classes and 1:1 training, and Iâ€™m big on clear routines, enrichment and gentle confidence-building. Every dog is different â€” my goal is for yours to feel safe, relaxed and happy from the moment they arrive.
    
     I live in a relaxed, calm home with a secure garden. If your dog has specific needs â€” medication, crate training, recall work, or feeding routines â€” Iâ€™ll always follow your plan so they feel safe and understood.
  
  
  
  Have a look at my reviews â†’





My Approach


âœ”ï¸ Walks tailored to age and energy â€” even on rainy days!
âœ”ï¸ Small numbers only â€” quality over quantity
âœ”ï¸ Honest, regular updates (photos, messages, progress notes)
âœ”ï¸ First-aid aware and fully insured with Petplan
